channel.title: BlueScar [317]
channel.description:
Well i just came here to talk about my little summer project, im trying to make a server (not host one) but just make a sever with smooth animations,npc talking, and just basicly a fun smooth working server, sofar i have almost all the npc's in varrock talking, there not saying what they say in rs, i decided just to have a little fun with it, but my main project is smooth animation, i want to get rid of that stupid [npc attacks you...he seems to have stretched in a million directions] that is my biggest annoyince with servers, so i decided for the corse of this summer to make a server that runs smoothly, then post it up here for who ever whats to host it or have it, cuase i dont like hosting servers,just makeing them. well heres a pic that i just found funny cuase it was a totaly accident that i spawned the wrong npc, but i went with it.
[IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm88/orgoth88/funny.png[/img]
P.s if anyone would like to help, feel free to, makes it more fun

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:5, topic:399709”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=496831.msg3632792#msg3632792 date=1308361847]
Add more information regarding the server, and use a bit more and better more grammar. You can add things like goals, future plans etc., not a bunched up paragraph like this.
[/quote]

I’m kidding, good luck with this.[/quote]
Thanks for pointing that out.

OT: Still no progress?

Read full topic
